overview: Warning! Excessive squirting! Exploding gushing erupting vaginas are the story of the month as I got some of the industry's sluttiest and prettiest performers together for this fuck fest. Jodi and Melody star in a full length feature parody of Killer Joe which is one of my favorite movies. Bailey Blue treats me to a private squirt on the beach and Leya is such a filthy whore I gave her to my friend Drehyden as a going away present. He almost didn't survive.
title: I Squirt
